item.title: Tesla Now Has Four Variants Of Model Y, 3 In US, But Fund Manager Thinks It Might Not Be The Case For Much Longer
item.description: With the addition of the standard version of the Model 3 and Model Y, each of Tesla’s two mass-market vehicles now has four variants.

item.title: Jupiter To ‘Progressively Convert’ $750 Million USDC Into New Solana Stablecoin JupUSD In Partnership With Ethena Labs
item.description: Ethena said JupUSD will be integrated into key areas of the Jupiter ecosystem, including Jupiter Perps and Jupiter Lend.
